external_games.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou Epilogue

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shou Epilogue
summary: It's been five months since the incidents at Caro mansion. Your relationship with Shou is going well and you even bring him along to meet your family. But there are still some things you feel Shou is keeping from you about his new life.
